Data Fields
vpsissIpipeifSaturaConfig Struct Reference
VPS Driver API » VPS - Common API » ISS - IPIPEIF Config API

Configuration parameters of saturation block. More...

#include <vps_cfgipipeif.h>

Data Fields

uint32_t enable
 
uint32_t sat
 
uint32_t dcClmp
 
uint32_t dsf
 

Detailed Description

Configuration parameters of saturation block.

Field Documentation

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifSaturaConfig::dcClmp

DC Clamp addition value, used in WDR split function for pseudo short frame. 8 LS bits would be used

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifSaturaConfig::dsf

Down shift value used in WDR split function, used for pseudo short frame

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifSaturaConfig::enable

TRUE enables saturation filter and FALSE disables. When disabled all below config values are ignored

uint32_t vpsissIpipeifSaturaConfig::sat

Value used in WDR split function for pseudo-long exposure frame. min is 0x0 and maximum if 0xFFFF. 0xFFFF disables sat
